name: part_002
file: tmp_【新衣装3Dお披露目】AZKi 6th Anniversary Live ＂百花繚乱＂【#AZKi新衣装3Dライブ】 [bHXB9qI2olE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: AZKi talks to the audience about the concept of her 6th anniversary live and introduces the collaboration part.
Transition scene with audience applause as the stage prepares for the next performance.
Performance of 'Kami-ppoi na' by AZKi, Usada Pekora, and Nekomata Okayu.
Performance of 'Neko Capurina' by Nekomata Okayu and AZKi.

subtitles.original: …上げです！
subtitles.english: ...thank you for the buildup!

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: 今日のね、ライブは前半は
subtitles.english: Today's live, in the first half...

subtitles.original: 活動6年頑張ってきたあずきのご褒美的な感じで
subtitles.english: as a sort of reward for AZKi, who has worked hard for 6 years of activity,

subtitles.original: 本当に本当にやりたいことを詰め込みました。
subtitles.english: I packed in the things I really, really wanted to do.

subtitles.original: 欲張りセットな感じで。
subtitles.english: It's like a greedy set.

subtitles.original: そして、後半はね、今回キービジュアルからもわかるかもしれませんが
subtitles.english: And then, for the second half, as you might tell from the key visual,

subtitles.original: ちょっと和風、和風なコンセプトでお届けしたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'd like to deliver it with a slightly Japanese-style concept!

subtitles.original: この後は、ゲストが登場するのでお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: After this, a guest will appear, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: それでは、コラボパートどうぞ！
subtitles.english: Well then, here is the collaboration part!

subtitles.original:
神っぽいな
作詞・作曲 ピノキオピー
subtitles.english:
God-ish
Lyrics & Composition: PinocchioP

subtitles.original: Oh my god
subtitles.english: Oh my god

subtitles.original: 愛のネタバレ「別れ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: Spoilers of love, it's like a "breakup"

subtitles.original: 人生のネタバレ「死ぬ」っぽいな
subtitles.english: Spoilers of life, it's like "dying"

subtitles.original: なにそれ意味深でかっこいいじゃん…
subtitles.english: What's that? It's so meaningful and cool...

subtitles.original: それっぽい単語集で踊ってんだ
subtitles.english: Dancing with a collection of words like that

subtitles.original: 死刑
subtitles.english: Death Penalty

subtitles.original: とぅる　とぅる　とぅる　"風"　ぽいじゃん　ぽいじゃん
subtitles.english: Tu-ru tu-ru tu-ru, like the "wind", like it, like it

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな
subtitles.english: God-ish

subtitles.original: もういいぜ　もういいぜ　それもういいぜ
subtitles.english: Enough already, enough already, that's enough already

subtitles.original: もういいぜ　逆に興奮してきたなあ
subtitles.english: Enough already, I'm actually starting to get excited

subtitles.original: おっきいね　おっきいね　夢おっきいね
subtitles.english: It's big, it's big, the dream is big

subtitles.original: 景気いいけど品性はジ・エンド　うえいうえいうえい
subtitles.english: Business is good but dignity is the end, yay yay yay

subtitles.original: Gott ist tot
subtitles.english: God is dead

subtitles.english: God-ish, that's unfair

subtitles.english: God-ish, that's "My God"

subtitles.original: アイウォンチュー　ウォンチュー　IQが下がっていく感じ

subtitles.english: Evil-ish, that's "I hate you"

subtitles.english: I hate you, I hate you, which one is the pest?

subtitles.original: その髪型　その目　その口元　その香水　その服　そのメイク

subtitles.english: That quote, that opinion, that criticism, that charisma, that gag, that sense
